sentences.en: After Marie Antoinette was guillotined, her lips moved in an attempt to speak.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特被送上断头台处决后，她的嘴唇动了动，想开口说话。

sentences.en: All the best , then, Marie, and we'll see you in two weeks.
sentences.cn: 那么祝你一切顺利, 玛丽, 我们两周后再见.

sentences.en: All the girls in the office whipped round to give Marie a wedding present.
sentences.cn: 办公室里所有的姑娘们都出了一点钱为玛丽买结婚礼品.

sentences.en: At five minutes to eleven he sauntered up to Marie's booth.
sentences.cn: 十一点差五分,他信步走进了玛丽的小篷子里.

sentences.en: He gallantly kissed Marie's hand as we prepared to leave.
sentences.cn: 我们准备离开的时候，他非常有礼貌地吻了吻玛丽的手。

sentences.en: I'd be Marie Antoinette and live in the luxury of Versailles.
sentences.cn: 我想成为在凡尔赛过着奢华生活的玛丽?安托瓦内特.

sentences.en: If it had been diamonds, Marie could not have been happier.
sentences.cn: >如果地上堆的是钻石, 玛丽倒不会这么高兴.

sentences.en: In 1891 Marie lived in Paris among a group of Polish exiles.
sentences.cn: 1891年玛丽生活在巴黎的一群波兰流亡者中.

sentences.en: Marie blinked at it with astonishment and sat down on the floor.
sentences.cn: 玛丽坐在地板上惊愕地望着它.

sentences.en: Marie Curie's remains were exhumed and interred in the Pantheon.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·居里的遗体被移出葬在先贤祠中.
玛丽发现了另一种物质,叫钍.

sentences.en: Marie seemed to revel in his old-fashioned chivalry.
sentences.cn: 玛丽好像陶醉在他那旧式的骑士风度里。

sentences.en: Marie slung her rucksack on the ground and sat beside it.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把背包往地上一放,在背包旁边坐下来.

sentences.en: Sensing she was on shaky ground, Marie changed the subject.
sentences.cn: 感到自己的观点站不住脚，玛丽于是换了个话题。

sentences.en: The chauffeur started up and Marie verified the current.
sentences.cn: 司机开动发电机,玛丽调节电流.

trans.tran_cn: 玛丽（女子名， Mary 的异体）
